item.title: [Delta] Object Glitch
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Your code is messier than the things I look at when I’m in public toilets.
Let me clean it up.

[code=java]
/**

  • Code of object 2181.
  • Variable quest1 must have a value of equal to or larger than 1 for this to work.
    */
    if ((objectID == 2181 && quest1 >= 1)) {
    if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) {
    actionInterval = 15000;
    lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
    setAnimation(2242);
    toX = 2824; // teleport in X coord 2824
    toY = 2975; // teleport in Y coord 2975
    resetAnimation();
    } else {
    sM(“The ballista hasn’t loaded yet.”);
    }
    } // end code[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:

First: When i click on it from like 10 yard away it activates how can i make that you need be standing close?

MY CODE:

[code]if ((objectID == 2181 && quest1 >= 1)) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) {

lastAction =
